channel.title: Fr33sc4pe - Server source
channel.description:
If you have used, the fr33sc4pe server source, could you please tell me where the server name is located, to edit.
Because, on the game play screen it still says fr33sc4pe. and i want to change it, what file will it be in?
It's not client.java and some of my npcs saying things aren't in npc handler what will they be in also.
Thanks, in advance, Josh

item.title: Fr33sc4pe - Server source
item.dc:creator: @pimping_one Pimping One
item.description:
@pimping_one wrote:

the @red@ @whi@ @gre@ @cya@ are colors… red, white, green, cyan… just delete all them chose what color then type ur server name in the “” so it would look like this SendFrame128("@red@Pimpingone", 6570);

Read full topic

item.title: Fr33sc4pe - Server source
item.dc:creator: @joshie joshie
item.description:
@joshie wrote:

Yes. while your playing, it says fr33sc4pe

owner=yourname etc[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 04:49:08 PM[/size][hr]//Playercount and server name at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@F@red@r@gre@3@cya@3@whi@s@red@c@gre@4@cya@p@whi@3@red@~", 6570);
sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@Joshie", 6572);
sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673

where can i change my server name

Read full topic
